comment: There's lots of life in the top layer of soil in an estuary.
Some organisms thrive or die because of the pH level.
The pH level varies natrually between estuaries.
You can change it by holding your hand over the slider on the left.
Other organisms thrive or die because of pollution.
Pollution is caused by urban and agricultural activity.
You can change it by holding your hand over the slider on the right.
